hypothesis_content.title: Low Gas Regime as Leading Indicator for Altcoin Outperformance
hypothesis_content.statement: When Ethereum gas prices remain below the 30th percentile of their 90-day range for 3 consecutive days during BULL regimes, gas-sensitive altcoins (CRV, GRT, BAT) will outperform BTC by >5% over the next 5 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Sustained low gas prices indicate reduced competition for block space, suggesting retail/smaller investors can transact cheaply. This typically benefits smaller-cap, utility-focused ERC-20 tokens that see increased transaction activity.
entry_conditions: Gas price < 30th percentile of 90-day range for 3 consecutive days
ETH/BTC ratio stable or rising last 3 days
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Low gas periods (>3 days) fail to predict altcoin outperformance in 3 out of next 5 bull regime instances
